A COMMITMENT TO QUALITY

GMCI ‘s policy is to produce and supply high quality products in full compliance with the regulatory requirements of its customers. GMCI will implement local and international regulations on chemical materials, transport and labelling. GMCI will also undertake to follow the environmental and safety laws strictly. Our emphasis is on continually enhancing quality in all regions and product lines to ensure our clients are completely pleased with our goods and services. Indeed, constant development in any area of our industry is important to the way we operate, which is why we have continuously invested in enhancing the quality of our minerals.

ISO CERTIFICATE

All our minerals are produced in accordance with management systems licensed or in line with the universal quality control standard ISO 9001:2015. This helps them to monitor output around the sector and to adapt new technology and services that satisfy the growing demands of the customers we represent.

QUALITY CONTROL

Quality is a very serious matter for GMCI. We aim to provide goods and services that fulfill the expectations of our clients through recognizing their present and potential desires. Our service processes are built to enhance productivity and to ensure customer satisfaction. Our layout provides constant supervision of the procedure as well as the management of all method parameters.

QUALITY STANDARDS

Strict quality standards are implemented at any point of the production, refining, packaging and distribution phase. Consistent quality is obtained by regulated procedures, assured by certificates of examination and regulatory specifications for each procedure.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
